name: Vegan Basil Ricotta Pinwheels
description: These vegan basil ricotta pinwheels are perfect for a quick and healthy lunch. They're also a real crowd pleaser at parties and family get-togethers.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup soaked unsalted cashews (Soak them for about 30 minutes. If you have a heavy duty blender it also works without soaking.)
1/2 cup black olives, cut into rings

recipeInstructions.text: First make the basil ricotta cheese: Place all ingredients in a food processor and process until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: First make the basil ricotta cheese: Place all ingredients in a food processor and process until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the basil ricotta evenly on the tortillas. Top with fresh spinach, chopped tomatoes, and black olives.
recipeInstructions.name: Divide the basil ricotta evenly on the tortillas. Top with fresh spinach, chopped tomatoes, and black olives.

recipeInstructions.text: Tightly roll up the tortillas. Press edges to seal. Trim off the ends and cut each roll into 6-8 slices.
